user.description: Provide information to connect to the Slide device

data_description.host: The hostname or IP address of your local Slide
data_description.password: The device code of your Slide (inside of the Slide or in the box, length is 8 characters). If your Slide runs firmware version 2 this is optional, as it is not used by the local API.

reconfigure.description: Reconfigure the information for your Slide device

abort.discovery_connection_failed: The setup of the discovered device failed with the following error: {error}. Please try to set it up manually.
abort.unique_id_mismatch: The mac address of the device ({mac}) does not match the previous mac address.

data_description.invert_position: Invert the position of your slide cover.

calibration_error.message: Error while sending the calibration request to the device.

touchgo_error.message: Error while sending the request setting Touch&Go to {state} to the device.

update_error.message: Error while updating data from the API.
